text: "You Can Never Stop Me Loving You" is a song written by Ian Samwell and Jean Slater, and released in 1963 by Kenny Lynch. Lynch's version spent 14 weeks on the UK's Record Retailer chart, reaching No. 10.Kenny Lynch - Full Official Chart History, Official Charts Company. Retrieved February 24, 2018. ==Johnny Tillotson recording== *Later in 1963, Johnny Tillotson recorded the song. Tillotson's version spent 10 weeks on the Billboard Hot 100 chart peaking at No. 18,Hot 100 - Johnny Tillotson You Can Never Stop Me Loving You Chart History, Billboard.com. Retrieved February 24, 2018. while reaching No. 4 on Billboards Middle-Road Singles chart,Adult Contemporary - Johnny Tillotson You Can Never Stop Me Loving You Chart History, Billboard.com. Retrieved February 24, 2018."Middle-Road Singles", Billboard, September 21, 1963. p. 60. Retrieved February 24, 2018. Outside the US, this version peaked at No. 1 in Germany,Johnny Tillotson - You Can Never Stop Me Loving You, norwegiancharts.com. Retrieved February 24, 2018. No. 3 in Israel,"Hits of the World", Billboard, December 7, 1963. p. 28. Retrieved February 24, 2018. and No. 4 in Hong Kong."Hits of the World", Billboard, October 26, 1963. p. 47.
